meaningMnemonic: You gotta <kanji>believe</kanji> it will <kanji>return</kanji>. What are you believing in returning? The <vocabulary>reply</vocabulary>. You made a request for something (come up with something you want really bad but have to ask for). Now you wait for the reply.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
